description:
Documentation says connection_type flag by default is 'libvirt' but it's defined as None in nova/flags.py

Should be changed to 'libvirt', this way we will have a default working configuration.
title: connection_type is None

comments.content:
Documentation says connection_type flag by default is 'libvirt' but it's defined as None in nova/flags.py

Should be changed to 'libvirt', this way we will have a default working configuration.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghe.rivero

comments.content: Which docs?  The docs that go along with the option in nova/flags.py are correct.  Note that these options got changed fairly recently.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Marked as invalid, 60 days no response to incomplete question. Please reopen if there is more info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
